categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Captain Lun Tessra was the commander of the 6th squadron of the 37th Imperial Fighter Wing in 7 BBY. He had a case of "temp-flu" (not wanting to die before the remainder of his tour of duty was up), which led to Soontir Fel taking a greater part in running the squadron during its time fighting the Reslian Purge.
